sourcesContent:
function AddServiceForm(props) { return (

setServiceName(event.target.value)} required/>
setServiceLocation(event.target.value)} required/>
setServicePrice(event.target.value)} min="0" required/>
setServiceAvailability(event.target.value)} required/>

setServiceImage(event.target.files[0])}/>
setServiceSlots(event.target.value)} min="0" required/>
); } export default AddServiceForm;
